name: simplifySchema

schema.description: The name of the type interface, (this could be used as $ref).

simplifiedSchema.description: The name of the type interface, (this could be used as $ref).

schema.description: The schema that needs to be simplified

name.description: the name of the schema, (without /definitions/ prefix like $ref)

schema.description: The array of other schemas found when crawling file this schema was found in. this also includes all refs to other type interfaces in all schemas in that file

simplifiedSchema.description: The array of other schemas found when crawling file this schema was found in. this also includes all refs to other type interfaces in all schemas in that file

schema.description: the name of the schema, (without /definitions/ prefix like $ref)
This function is recursive. If we find any reference to another schema, we will add the name of the current schema to the rootStack and explore that schema.

simplifiedSchema.description: This function is recursive. If we find any reference to another schema, we will add the name of the current schema to the rootStack and explore that schema.

description: return a SimplifiedSchema by giving the JSONSchema7 schema, its name and a list of possible references in the JSONSchema
